Login


Step 1:

Once you have been created as a user, check your email for your username and temporary password as seen in the image below:

Step 2:

Navigate to [site URL] and enter your credentials.

Step 3:

Upon successful login you will need to reset your password. Your new password must be more than 8 characters, have atleast one capitol and atleast one number.

Step 4:

Once you have entered a valid password, enter it again to confirm, then click the green 'Submit' button.

DONE!

You can now login with your username and new password!

Reset Password


Step 1:

From the login screen, select the 'Forgot password' link.

Step 2:

Enter your email address and click 'Submit'.

Step 3:

Check your email for your temporary password as seen in the image below:

Step 4:

Back at the login screen, enter your username and new temporary passsword.

Step 5:

Upon successful login you will need to reset your password. Your new password must be more than 8 characters, have atleast one capitol and atleast one number.

Step 6:

Once you have entered a valid password, enter it again to confirm, then click the green 'Submit' button.

DONE!

You can now login with your username and new password!

Add New Client


Step 1:

From the dashboard, select 'Suitability'.

Step 2:

Begin filling out clients information. The first three fields in the 'Client Info' section are mandatory.

Step 3:

Once you have moved through all sections, review points and click 'Save'

Step 4:

A new client will be created and a welcome email will be sent to the email address provided along with their credentials for logging in.

*Username will be clients first name and last name, no capitals, no spaces.


Step 5:

If no email was provided then the client will be created with the default password 'Georgian2018' and email will be set based on campus.

Step 5:

If no information was entered in the four sections after 'Client Info', you will recieve a message confirming that the client will be created without a suitability form and will need to be completed at a later time from the 'Client Manage' page.

DONE!

Upon successful client creation you will be redirected to the 'Manage Clients' page and should now see the newly created client.

Manage Clients


About:

This section of the app allows you to view client status, view/edit client forms, files and information, and create client as a student user.

Client Status:

There are currently four stages that a client can be a part of:

Red - Suitability incomplete

Yellow - Consent and/or Learning Style incomplete

Blue - Client information ready for input into Banner and CAM

Green - Client ready to become student

View Client Info:

Select the red dropdown arrow under the 'Action' column for the client you want to view. Select 'View Info'.

The clients info will appear on the right and from here you can:

View/Edit General Info

View/Edit Suitability

View Learning Style

View Consent

Manage Files

Create Student


Step 1:

The status of the client must be green before they can be created as a student user. Ensure all forms have been completed and the clients information has been entered into Banner and CAM.

Step 2:

From the 'Client Manage' page, click the red dropdown arrow under the 'Action' column for the client you want to create as student. Select 'Create as Student'.

Step 3:

Enter the clients assigned student number:

Step 4:

Confirm the clients student number:

Done!

The client will now become a student user and you will be redirected to the 'Manage Students' page.

Manage Staff


About:

This section of the app allows you to manage forms, files and information for staff memebers.

Create New Staff User:

Step 1:

Click on the green 'Add Staff' button in the top right corner.

Step 2:

Select a role for the staff user then enter their first/last name and email.

Step 3:

Click the green 'Submit' button.

Done!

The new staff user will be created and credentials for login will be sent to their email.

Edit Staff User Information:

Step 1:

Under the 'Action' column for the staff user you want to view, select 'Edit'.

Step 2:

Edit the necessary information, then click 'Save'.

Done!

The staff users information will be updated and you will be redirected back to the 'Manage Staff' page.

Delete Staff User:

Step 1:

Under the 'Action' column for the staff user you want to view, select 'Delete'.

Step 2:

Select 'Yes, Delete!' to confirm staff user removal.

Done!

The user and their privileges will be removed from the database.

Manage Courses


About:

This section of the app allows you to manage course information.

Create New Course:

Step 1:

Click on the green 'Add a Course' button in the top right corner.

Step 2:

Enter all information for the course on the left side:

Step 3:

In order to set what time you the class will start and end at, select the day you want the classes to occur on:

Step 4:

Enter the time the class will start and end:

Step 5:

If the class will occur more than once during the week, select another day and complete step 4 again.

Step 6:

Once you have entered all information and are ready to save the course, click the green 'Submit' button in the top right corner.

Done!

The new course will be created and you will be redirected the 'Course Manage' page.

Edit Course Information:

Step 1:

Under the 'Action' column for the course you want to work with, select 'Edit'.

Step 2:

Edit the necessary information, then click 'Save'.

Done!

The course information will be updated and you will be redirected back to the 'Manage Courses' page.

Delete Course:

Step 1:

Under the 'Action' column for the course you want to remove, select 'Delete'.

Step 2:

Select 'Yes, Delete!' to confirm course removal.

Done!

The course will be removed from the database.
